sentences.english: As well as studying, Wai Yee enjoyed participating in some of the many activities available at the University.
sentences.chinese: 读书以外，蕙仪喜欢参与大学多彩多姿的课外活动。

sentences.english: Colorful life, deduce the color of life.
sentences.chinese: 多彩多姿的人生，演绎出了生命的颜色。

sentences.english: The world is a man and woman, just so, colorful and flexibility.
sentences.chinese: 世界有了男和，才这般刚柔相济，多彩多姿。

sentences.english: This is what makes our world so diverse and worth discovering.
sentences.chinese: 这正是我们的世界如此多彩多姿和值得探索的原因。

sentences.english: One of the most colourful and bizarre festivals in the world takes place outside Bangkok this Saturday. Andrew Spooner joins the devotees
sentences.chinese: 本周六，一场多彩多姿的奇特节日在曼谷外举行。
